src:
【豪門爆姦情2】元祖小開搞不倫　對象竟是大黑松小倆口千金
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by 娛樂組, 攝影組
日前爆出「元祖少奶奶」安晨妤與老公張劭緯鬧婚變，安母接受媒體訪問，驚爆女兒「人財兩失」，並說女婿坦承出軌2次、且張家欠安晨妤1,600萬元不還，甚至透露握有不雅照、影片等，引爆一波「元祖家醜」。更醜的是，新聞傳出後事件未因此落幕，本刊取得其中一張獨家照，發現張劭緯出軌對象竟是元祖競爭對手大黑松小倆口的千金邱威樺。





邱威樺個頭嬌小長相甜美，常在臉書幫自家產品做宣傳。（翻攝自邱威樺臉書）

根據讀者向本刊透露，元祖小開母親張秀琬是上海市台協常務副會長，相當重視「圓桌教育基金會」舉辦的心靈課程，多次找媳婦安晨妤參加，安晨妤透過張秀琬的關係，在圓桌結識不少高爾夫球的球友；只是有次安晨妤因故無法參加聚會，改由張劭緯赴約，於是張劭緯在球友聚會中認識了邱威樺，兩人從球友關係漸漸發展成不倫戀，安晨妤卻被蒙在鼓裡。








本刊同時取得兩人於2014年在晶華酒店偷買情侶對戒的合照，照片中兩人的左手食指上戴同款戒指，並擺同樣的pose，對著鏡頭拍照，照片中的邱威樺眉開眼笑，一副幸福甜蜜樣，而張劭緯也是一臉愉悅，似乎笑中隱藏些許偷情的快感。
更新時間｜2019.11.06 04:38
text:
[Grandfather's affair and affair 2] Yuanzu Xiaokai is unruly. The object is actually a big black pine couple.
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by Entertainment Group, Photography Group
A few days ago, "Ancestral grandmother and grandmother" An Chenxi and her husband Zhang Yuwei had a marriage, and Anmu received media interviews and shocked her daughter "two losses of people and money". She said that the son-in-law confessed to derailment twice and that Zhang’s family owed Anchen to 16 million yuan. Also, even revealed that there are indecent photos, films, etc., detonating a wave of "Yuanzu's ugliness." What is even more ugly is that the news did not end after the news came out. The magazine obtained one of the exclusive photos, and found that Zhang Haowei’s derailed object was actually Qian Qiuhua, the daughter of Yuanzu’s rival, the big black pine.





Qiu Weihua's petite looks are sweet and often promote his own products on Facebook. (Reflected from Qiu Weihua Facebook)

According to the reader's disclosure to the journal, Yuan Zuxiaokai's mother, Zhang Xiuzhen, is the executive vice president of the Shanghai Association of Taiwan. She attaches great importance to the spiritual curriculum organized by the Round Table Education Foundation. She has repeatedly visited her wife, An Chenxi, and her relationship through Zhang Xiuzhen. At the round table, I got to know a lot of golfers. Just because An Chen was unable to attend the party for a reason, Zhang Weiwei went to the appointment, so Zhang Weiwei met Qiu Weihua at the party of the players. The two gradually developed from the relationship of the players. Love, An Chenxi is being kept in the dark.








At the same time, the magazine obtained a photo of two people who bought a couple's ring at Jinghua Hotel in 2014. In the photo, the two people wear the same ring on the index finger of the left hand and put the same pose. They photographed the camera. The photo of Qiu Weihua opened his eyes and smiled. A pair of happiness and sweetness, and Zhang Yiwei is also a happy face, it seems that the smile hides some pleasure.
Update time|2019.11.06 04:38
